snippet: The former N.F.L. commissioner Paul Tagliabue, who was instrumental in the league's efforts to diversify its coaching and front office ranks, has been honored by the Jackie Robinson Foundation with its Robie Humanitarian Award.
abstract: The former N.F.L. commissioner Paul Tagliabue, who was instrumental in the league's efforts to diversify its coaching and front office ranks, has been honored by the Jackie Robinson Foundation with its Robie Humanitarian Award.
